{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Customer Support Specialist",
  "description": "Natural Girl Wigs is a hair science lab that develops the famous ReXI&trade; Lab Made Hair and builds delightful hair brands that ride on the strength of our innovative ReXI Lab Made Hair technology. We bring ethical and stylish Instant Glam to millions of women worldwide.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Support Specialist
Job Location:&nbsp;Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary


	We&#39;re looking to hire a smart person that has great attention to detail, good writing skills, high level of empathy, and the ability to use a computer and understand how technology works super well.
	We have a 2-step interview process (written application/case study, and an interview). We&#39;re invested in hiring the best candidates.
	This position is full time onsite and our location is Yaba, Lagos


Role description


	Responding promptly and professionally to customer inquiries and complaints via various channels (email, phone, social media chats)
	Assisting customers with order placement, modifications, and product information.
	Proactively manage the customer communication from item dispatch to arrival at the destination
	Coordinating with the store operations team to ensure accurate and timely delivery.
	Resolving customer complaints in a timely and efficient manner.
	Log daily reports to track work performance.
	Manage communication with our last-mile delivery partners
	Find opportunities to upsell customers and close sales.
	Monitoring customer interactions to ensure a consistent and positive customer experience


Job Requirements


	Attention to detail
	Experience doing customer service work is an additional bonus
	Ability to use a computer and understand how technology works
	Proficient in making calls to assist customers effectively
	Ability to find simple ways to improve ordinary things
	Proper written and spoken English
	Ability to self-manage themselves
	Effective communication skill





Benefits


	Internet allowance
	Health Insurance
	Access to learning resources &amp; opportunities
	Paid time off
	Employee discounts / loans


Note


	Click on this typeform link to apply, the link also contains a case study that you are to work on.
	After completion of the case study, go back to the typeform to submit:
	If you&#39;re successful in the test, we will reach out to you to schedule a final interview
	Only qualified candidates will be contacted.
",
  "datePosted": "2025-12-16",
  "validThrough": "2025-12-31",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Natural Girl Wigs"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",
    "address": {
      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",
       "addressRegion": ". ",
       "streetAddress": ". ",
      "addressLocality": "Lagos",
      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "191936"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",
    "value": {
      "@type": "QuantitativeValue",
      "minValue": 0,
      "maxValue": 0,
      "unitText": "MONTH"
    }
  }
}



Customer Support Specialist Job at Natural Girl Wigs




        
    

        
        Natural Girl Wigs is a hair science lab that develops the famous ReXI™ Lab Made Hair and builds delightful hair brands that ride on the strength of our innovative ReXI Lab Made Hair technology. We bring ethical and stylish Instant Glam to millions of women worldwide.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Support Specialist
Job Location: Yaba, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Summary
     

            
    




	We're looking to hire a smart person that has great attention to detail, good writing skills, high level of empathy, and the ability to use a computer and understand how technology works super well.
	We have a 2-step interview process (written application/case study, and an interview). We're invested in hiring the best candidates.
	This position is full time onsite and our location is Yaba, Lagos


Role description


	Responding promptly and professionally to customer inquiries and complaints via various channels (email, phone, social media chats)
	Assisting customers with order placement, modifications, and product information.
	Proactively manage the customer communication from item dispatch to arrival at the destination
	Coordinating with the store operations team to ensure accurate and timely delivery.
	Resolving customer complaints in a timely and efficient manner.
	Log daily reports to track work performance.
	Manage communication with our last-mile delivery partners
	Find opportunities to upsell customers and close sales.
	Monitoring customer interactions to ensure a consistent and positive customer experience


Job Requirements


	Attention to detail
	Experience doing customer service work is an additional bonus
	Ability to use a computer and understand how technology works
	Proficient in making calls to assist customers effectively
	Ability to find simple ways to improve ordinary things
	Proper written and spoken English
	Ability to self-manage themselves
	Effective communication skill





Benefits


	Internet allowance
	Health Insurance
	Access to learning resources & opportunities
	Paid time off
	Employee discounts / loans


Note


	Click on this typeform link to apply, the link also contains a case study that you are to work on.
	After completion of the case study, go back to the typeform to submit:
	If you're successful in the test, we will reach out to you to schedule a final interview
	Only qualified candidates will be contacted.
    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Manager",
  "description": "Lvtopsun is one of the leading manufacturing company of solar products in nigeria, products like inverter, solar battery etc.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Manager

Job Location:&nbsp;Port Hacourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	Team leadership:&nbsp;Guide, motivate, and build high-performing teams, coordinating their efforts efficiently.
	Resource management:&nbsp;Effectively manage resources, including inventory and project schedules.
	Communication:&nbsp;Clear, concise communication is essential for interacting with internal teams, clients, vendors, and management. This includes both written and verbal skills, and the ability to translate technical solar jargon into layman&#39;s terms for various audiences.
	Organizational &amp; Time Management:&nbsp;The office manager will juggle multiple responsibilities, from schedules and inventory to facility maintenance. Excellent organization and the ability to prioritize tasks are crucial for keeping the office running smoothly.
	Adaptability &amp; Flexibility:&nbsp;The solar industry is dynamic, requiring managers to be adaptable to evolving market conditions, technological advancements, and regulatory changes within the office setting.
	Responsible for staff management and other office operations.
	Driving sales growth and expanding market presence.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor&#39;s Degree with 3-4 years of experience.
	Must have solar experience: Understand solar photovoltaic (PV) and solar thermal systems, including design, installation, and operation.
	Electrical and mechanical fundamentals:&nbsp;Possess a solid grasp of electrical circuits, energy storage, and the mechanics of support structures.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to:&nbsp;Lvtopsunng@gmail.com&nbsp;using the Job Position as the subject of the email.",

  "validThrough": "2026-01-01",
  "employmentType": "Full-Time",
  "hiringOrganization": {
    "@type": "Organization",
    "name": "Lvtopsun New Energy Company Limited"
    
  },
  "jobLocation": {
    "@type": "Place",

      "@type": "PostalAddress",
       "postalCode": ". ",

       "streetAddress": ". ",

      "addressCountry": "NG"
     
      
    }
  },
  "identifier": {
    "@type": "PropertyValue",
    "name": "",
    "value": "191935"
  },
  "baseSalary": {
    "@type": "MonetaryAmount",
    "currency": "NGN",

      "minValue": 250000,
      "maxValue": 400000,

Manager Job at Lvtopsun New Energy Company Limited




        
    

        
        Lvtopsun is one of the leading manufacturing company of solar products in nigeria, products like inverter, solar battery etc.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Manager

Job Location: Port Hacourt, Rivers
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role
     

            
    




	Team leadership: Guide, motivate, and build high-performing teams, coordinating their efforts efficiently.
	Resource management: Effectively manage resources, including inventory and project schedules.
	Communication: Clear, concise communication is essential for interacting with internal teams, clients, vendors, and management. This includes both written and verbal skills, and the ability to translate technical solar jargon into layman's terms for various audiences.
	Organizational & Time Management: The office manager will juggle multiple responsibilities, from schedules and inventory to facility maintenance. Excellent organization and the ability to prioritize tasks are crucial for keeping the office running smoothly.
	Adaptability & Flexibility: The solar industry is dynamic, requiring managers to be adaptable to evolving market conditions, technological advancements, and regulatory changes within the office setting.
	Responsible for staff management and other office operations.
	Driving sales growth and expanding market presence.


Requirements


	Interested candidates should possess a Bachelor's Degree with 3-4 years of experience.
	Must have solar experience: Understand solar photovoltaic (PV) and solar thermal systems, including design, installation, and operation.
	Electrical and mechanical fundamentals: Possess a solid grasp of electrical circuits, energy storage, and the mechanics of support structures.


Salary
N250,000 - N300,000 / Month.

Method of Application
Interested and qualified candidates should send their CV to: Lvtopsunng@gmail.com using the Job Position as the subject of the email.    

    

        Click here to Apply

{
  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Instrument Method Engineer",
  "description": "WTS Energy - Our client is a&nbsp;Nigerian company that provides services and builds capacity for the oil and gas industry. Their services include operations and maintenance, commissioning, technical assistance, and engineering, procurement, and construction (EPC) projects. They also offer training programs for personnel to improve their skills in areas like operations, maintenance, and safety.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position:&nbsp;Instrument Method Engineer

Job Location:&nbsp;Lagos

Key Responsibilties


	Ensure Bill of Materials (BOM&rsquo;s) are linked to equipment preventive maintenance tasks.
	Assist in populating and tracking project maintenance activities in Operations Readiness Plan
	Participate in 3D model, layout, HAZID, HAZOP and LOPA reviews, providing pragmatic input through the lens of planning, Maintainability consequence to inspection and maintenance personnel.
	Provide input in the selection, procurement, delivery, and preservation of spare parts.
	Validate maintenance job plans and procedures. Ensures correct labour codes and hours are in CMMS covering all required trades.
	Identify initial equipment and materials to purchase/stock to support maintenance as well as ensure. Maintenance Strategy is fully functional, and equipment/ spares are properly documented.
	Manages the resource scheduling and smoothing within the maintenance &amp; integrity of offshore operations.
	Participate in the definition of long-term maintenance planning (includes time schedule and resources definition).
	Process quality work orders and produce work packs, follow the Work Management system standard, that significantly attribute to safe and reliable operations.


Supervision and Training:


	Control maintenance activity through IPES (SAP),
	Preparation of a training program for the trainees&rsquo; engineers in the frame of the identified needs and in accordance with recognized methods and strategies,

Tasks:

	Contribute to Budget elaboration and Planning&rsquo;

Instrument Method Engineer Job at WTS Energy




        
    

        
        WTS Energy - Our client is a Nigerian company that provides services and builds capacity for the oil and gas industry. Their services include operations and maintenance, commissioning, technical assistance, and engineering, procurement, and construction (EPC) projects. They also offer training programs for personnel to improve their skills in areas like operations, maintenance, and safety.

They are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Instrument Method Engineer

Job Location: Lagos

Key Responsibilties
     

            
    




	Ensure Bill of Materials (BOM’s) are linked to equipment preventive maintenance tasks.
	Assist in populating and tracking project maintenance activities in Operations Readiness Plan
	Participate in 3D model, layout, HAZID, HAZOP and LOPA reviews, providing pragmatic input through the lens of planning, Maintainability consequence to inspection and maintenance personnel.
	Provide input in the selection, procurement, delivery, and preservation of spare parts.
	Validate maintenance job plans and procedures. Ensures correct labour codes and hours are in CMMS covering all required trades.
	Identify initial equipment and materials to purchase/stock to support maintenance as well as ensure. Maintenance Strategy is fully functional, and equipment/ spares are properly documented.
	Manages the resource scheduling and smoothing within the maintenance & integrity of offshore operations.
	Participate in the definition of long-term maintenance planning (includes time schedule and resources definition).
	Process quality work orders and produce work packs, follow the Work Management system standard, that significantly attribute to safe and reliable operations.


Supervision and Training:


	Control maintenance activity through IPES (SAP),
	Preparation of a training program for the trainees’ engineers in the frame of the identified needs and in accordance with recognized methods and strategies,
	Training on Job examples and directly in contact with the maintenance of the FPSO,
	Evaluation of trainees’ performances in the craft.


Tasks:


	To ensure the operation and maintenance strategy for equipment of the craft,
	Management of craft related documentation: doc. Supplier, etc,
	Participate in the studies of engineering
	Participate in the reception of the studies/developments/equipment for the discipline,
	Assist with site operation as required: detection of the anomalies, diagnosis of the failures, installation of the plans of repairing of the equipment, validation of the technical solutions suggested,
	Follow up of the trading of salesmen and/or suppliers,
	Preparation of SD (Shut Down partial or complete) and other projects.


Contractor Supervision:


	Verification of the management of spare parts while complying with prescribed methods and strategies,
	Follow up the purchasing of replacement parts,
	Audit of these Contractors when required,
	Supervision of maintenance contractor’s preparation and scheduling activity,
	Technical follow-up of the SMC (Specific Maintenance Contract).


Optimization and Development:


	Carry out regular audits on site’s electrical installations, follow and work on clearing relevant punch list,
	Contribute to the SERVICE field to integrate for future developments,
	Contribute to training collaborators in the disciplines (guidance, training courses),
	Proposition of improvement in craft maintenance strategy based on Site requests and needs. 


Management:


	Provide relevant Lessons Learned to the respective trade (head office),
	Contribute to the integration of future development,
	Manage craft preparation team in their long and mid-term tasks’
	Contribute to Budget elaboration and Planning’
	Report on craft activities.


Knowledge & Skills Required


	Equivalent of B.Sc. Engineering (2.1),
	10 years of general industrial maintenance, with 5 years assignment in the oil/gas or petrochemical industries,
	Calm and confident – Remaining cold-headed during stressful situations,
	Good communicator – Leading Intervention Team with short and clear instructions. Efficiently animating trainings and inductions,
	Team-player – Maintaining good spirit within all teams,
	Motivated and Enthusiastic – Positive attitude, determined and thorough,
	Developing and building teams – Encouraging and building mutual trust, respect, and cooperation among team members,
	Coaching and developing others – identifying the developmental needs of others and coaching, mentoring, or otherwise helping others to improve their knowledge or skills,
	Conduct trainings/inductions for personnel,
	Reliability, autonomy, analytical, organizational capacity and leadership
	Knowledge SAP PM / MM.


Professional Qualifications:


	Equivalent of B.Sc. Mechanical / Instrumentation / Electrical Engineering (2.1),
	Computer literacy is required
	Ability to work offshore under the climatic conditions of the site,
	Ability to work in a multinational team. Ability to work in a service relationship.
	Competence/experience in the craft (static and rotating equipment, electricity, instrument),
	Experience in CMMS (SAP/Maximo) and Microsoft Office Suite
	BOSIET HUET / Basic Fire Fighting / Basic First Aid / CA-EBS
	Risk awareness and prevention
	Working language: English.


Specific Professional Knowledge:


	Mechanical: Gas Generators, Gas compressors, Hydraulic systems, Diesel Engines, Broad spectrum of pumps experience (all types), Air compressors and General Utilities equipment.
	Electrical: All Types of inverters, high voltage cells, variable speed units, HV/LV drive motors, Electrical Distribution Network, Lighting, Electrical Power Generation and distribution,
	Instrumentation: All Types of instrumentation, meters, Valves, F&Gs, ICSS, DCS and PLC systems.
